Technical.name: 4-koma
Technical.description: A manga in the 'yonkoma' format, which consists of four equal-sized panels arranged in a vertical strip.

Technical.name: Achromatic
Technical.description: Contains animation that is primarily done in black and white.

Technical.name: Advertisement
Technical.description: Produced in order to promote the products of a certain company.

Technical.name: Anthology
Technical.description: A collection of separate works collated into a single release.

Technical.name: CGI
Technical.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

Technical.name: Episodic
Technical.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

Technical.name: Full CGI
Technical.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

Technical.name: Full Color
Technical.description: Manga that were initially published in full color.

Technical.name: Long Strip
Technical.description: Manga originally published in a vertical, long-strip format, designed for viewing on smartphones. Also known as webtoons.

Technical.name: Mixed Media
Technical.description: Features a combination of different media and animation techniques. Often seen with puppetry, textiles, live action footage, stop motion, and more. This does not include works with normal usage of CGI in their production.

Technical.name: Non-fiction
Technical.description: A work that provides information regarding a real world topic and does not focus on an imaginary narrative.

Technical.name: POV
Technical.description: Point of View; features scenes shown from the perspective of the series protagonist.

Technical.name: Puppetry
Technical.description: Animation style involving the manipulation of puppets to act out scenes.

Technical.name: Rotoscoping
Technical.description: Animation technique that animators use to trace over motion picture footage, frame by frame, to produce realistic action.

Technical.name: Stop Motion
Technical.description: Animation style characterized by physical objects being moved incrementally between frames to create the illusion of movement.

Technical.name: Vertical Video
Technical.description: Animated works originally created in a vertical aspect ratio (such as 9:16), intended for viewing on smartphones.

Setting-Time.name: Achronological Order
Setting-Time.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

Setting-Time.name: Anachronism
Setting-Time.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

Setting-Time.name: Ancient China
Setting-Time.description: Setting in ancient china, does not apply to fantasy settings.

Setting-Time.name: Dystopian
Setting-Time.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

Setting-Time.name: Historical
Setting-Time.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

Setting-Time.name: Medieval
Setting-Time.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

Setting-Time.name: Time Skip
Setting-Time.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

Theme-Game-Sport.name: Acrobatics
Theme-Game-Sport.description: The art of jumping, tumbling, and balancing. Often paired with trapeze, trampolining, tightropes, or general gymnastics.

Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around the sport of boxing.

Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around the sport of handball.

Theme-Game-Sport.name: Scuba Diving
Theme-Game-Sport.description: Prominently features characters diving with the aid of special breathing equipment.

Theme-Game-Sport.name: Skateboarding

Theme-Game-Sport.name: Sumo
Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around the sport of sumo.

Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around surfing as a sport.

Theme-Game-Sport.name: Swimming
Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around the sport of swimming.

Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around the sport of table tennis (also known as "ping pong").

Theme-Game-Sport.name: Tennis
Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around the sport of tennis.

Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around the sport of volleyball.

Theme-Game-Sport.description: Centers around the sport of wrestling.

Theme-Arts.name: Acting
Theme-Arts.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

Theme-Arts.name: Ballet
Theme-Arts.description: Prominently features the dance art of ballet. Both traditional and contemporary styles.

Theme-Arts.name: Calligraphy
Theme-Arts.description: Centers around the art of calligraphy.

Theme-Arts.name: Classic Literature
Theme-Arts.description: Discusses or adapts a work of classic world literature.

Theme-Arts.name: Drawing
Theme-Arts.description: Centers around the art of drawing, including manga and doujinshi.

Theme-Arts.name: Food
Theme-Arts.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

Theme-Arts.name: Kabuki
Theme-Arts.description: Prominently features the traditional Japanese theater art of kabuki.

Theme-Arts.name: Manzai
Theme-Arts.description: Prominently features an act of traditional Japanese comedy that involves two performers.

Theme-Arts.name: Modeling
Theme-Arts.description: Features a line of work with the purpose of displaying and advertising products such as makeup, clothing, and jewelry. Also includes posing artistically for figure drawing, painting, sculpting, and photography.

Theme-Arts.name: Photography
Theme-Arts.description: Centers around the use of cameras to capture photos.

Theme-Arts.name: Rakugo
Theme-Arts.description: Rakugo is the traditional Japanese performance art of comic storytelling.

Theme-Arts.name: Writing
Theme-Arts.description: Centers around the profession of writing books or novels.

Theme-Other.name: Adoption
Theme-Other.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

Theme-Other.name: Animals
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

Theme-Other.name: Astronomy
Theme-Other.description: Relating or centered around the study of celestial objects and phenomena, space, or the universe.

Theme-Other.name: Autobiographical
Theme-Other.description: Real stories and anecdotes written by the author about their own life.

Theme-Other.name: Biographical
Theme-Other.description: Based on true stories of real persons living or dead, written by another.

Theme-Other.name: Blackmail
Theme-Other.description: Features a character blackmailing another.

Theme-Other.name: Body Horror
Theme-Other.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

Theme-Other.name: Body Image
Theme-Other.description: Features themes of self-esteem concerning perceived defects or flaws in appearance, such as body weight or disfigurement, and may discuss topics such as eating disorders, fatphobia, and body dysmorphia.

Theme-Other.name: Cannibalism
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features the act of consuming another member of the same species as food.

Theme-Other.name: Chibi
Theme-Other.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

Theme-Other.name: Cosmic Horror
Theme-Other.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

Theme-Other.name: Creature Taming
Theme-Other.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

Theme-Other.name: Crime
Theme-Other.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

Theme-Other.name: Crossover
Theme-Other.description: Centers around the placement of two or more otherwise discrete fictional characters, settings, or universes into the context of a single story.

Theme-Other.name: Death Game
Theme-Other.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

Theme-Other.name: Denpa
Theme-Other.description: Works that feature themes of social dissociation, delusions, and other issues like suicide, bullying, self-isolation, paranoia, and technological necessity in daily lives. Classic iconography: telephone poles, rooftops, and trains.

Theme-Other.name: Drugs
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

Theme-Other.name: Economics
Theme-Other.description: Centers around the field of economics.

Theme-Other.name: Educational
Theme-Other.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

Theme-Other.name: Environmental
Theme-Other.description: Concern with the state of the natural world and how humans interact with it.

Theme-Other.name: Ero Guro
Theme-Other.description: Japanese literary and artistic movement originating in the 1930's. Works have a focus on grotesque eroticism, sexual corruption, and decadence.

Theme-Other.name: Filmmaking
Theme-Other.description: Centers around the art of filmmaking.

Theme-Other.name: Found Family
Theme-Other.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

Theme-Other.name: Gambling
Theme-Other.description: Centers around the act of gambling.

Theme-Other.name: Gender Bending
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

Theme-Other.name: Gore
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

Theme-Other.name: Indigenous Cultures
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features real-life indigenous cultures.

Theme-Other.name: Language Barrier
Theme-Other.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

Theme-Other.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

Theme-Other.name: Lost Civilization
Theme-Other.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

Theme-Other.name: Marriage
Theme-Other.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

Theme-Other.name: Medicine
Theme-Other.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

Theme-Other.name: Memory Manipulation
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

Theme-Other.name: Meta
Theme-Other.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

Theme-Other.name: Mountaineering
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features characters discussing or hiking mountains.

Theme-Other.name: Noir
Theme-Other.description: Stylized as a cynical crime drama with low-key visuals.

Theme-Other.name: Otaku Culture
Theme-Other.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

Theme-Other.name: Pandemic
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

Theme-Other.name: Philosophy
Theme-Other.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

Theme-Other.name: Politics
Theme-Other.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

Theme-Other.name: Pregnancy
Theme-Other.description: Features pregnant female characters or discusses the topic of pregnancy.

Theme-Other.name: Proxy Battle
Theme-Other.description: A proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode.

Theme-Other.name: Psychosexual
Theme-Other.description: Work that involves the psychological aspects of sexual impulses.

Theme-Other.name: Reincarnation
Theme-Other.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

Theme-Other.name: Religion
Theme-Other.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

Theme-Other.name: Rescue
Theme-Other.description: Centers around operations that carry out urgent treatment of injuries, remove people from danger, or save lives. This includes series that are about search-and-rescue teams, trauma surgeons, firefighters, and more.

Theme-Other.name: Royal Affairs
Theme-Other.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

Theme-Other.name: Slavery
Theme-Other.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

Theme-Other.name: Software Development
Theme-Other.description: Centers around characters developing or programming a piece of technology, software, gaming, etc.

Theme-Other.name: Survival
Theme-Other.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

Theme-Other.name: Terrorism
Theme-Other.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

Theme-Other.name: Torture
Theme-Other.description: The act of deliberately inflicting severe pain or suffering upon another individual or oneself as a punishment or with a specific purpose.

Theme-Other.name: Travel
Theme-Other.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

Theme-Other.name: Vocal Synth
Theme-Other.description: Features one or more singers or characters that are products of a synthesize singing program. Popular examples are Vocaloids, UTAUloids, and CeVIOs.

Theme-Other.name: War
Theme-Other.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

Setting-Universe.name: Afterlife
Setting-Universe.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

Setting-Universe.name: Alternate Universe
Setting-Universe.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

Setting-Universe.name: Augmented Reality
Setting-Universe.description: Prominently features events with augmented reality as the main setting.

Setting-Universe.name: Omegaverse
Setting-Universe.description: Alternative universe that prominently features dynamics modeled after wolves in which there are alphas, betas, and omegas and heat cycles as well as impregnation, regardless of gender.

Setting-Universe.name: Post-Apocalyptic
Setting-Universe.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

Setting-Universe.name: Space
Setting-Universe.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

Setting-Universe.name: Urban Fantasy
Setting-Universe.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

Setting-Universe.name: Virtual World
Setting-Universe.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

Theme-Romance.name: Age Gap
Theme-Romance.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

Theme-Romance.name: Boys' Love
Theme-Romance.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

Theme-Romance.name: Cohabitation
Theme-Romance.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

Theme-Romance.name: Female Harem
Theme-Romance.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

Theme-Romance.name: Heterosexual
Theme-Romance.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

Theme-Romance.name: Love Triangle
Theme-Romance.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

Theme-Romance.name: Male Harem
Theme-Romance.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

Theme-Romance.name: Matchmaking
Theme-Romance.description: Prominently features either a matchmaker or events with the intent of matchmaking with eventual marriage in sight.

Theme-Romance.name: Mixed Gender Harem
Theme-Romance.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

Theme-Romance.name: Polyamorous
Theme-Romance.description: Features a character who is in a consenting relationship with multiple people at one time.

Theme-Romance.name: Teens' Love
Theme-Romance.description: Sexually explicit love-story between individuals of the opposite sex, specifically targeting females of teens and young adult age.

Theme-Romance.name: Unrequited Love
Theme-Romance.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

Theme-Romance.name: Yuri
Theme-Romance.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

Cast-Traits.name: Age Regression
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

Cast-Traits.name: Agender
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features agender characters.

Cast-Traits.name: Aliens
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features extraterrestrial lifeforms.

Cast-Traits.name: Amnesia
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

Cast-Traits.name: Angels
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

Cast-Traits.name: Anthropomorphism
Cast-Traits.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

Cast-Traits.name: Aromantic
Cast-Traits.description: Features a character who experiences little to no romantic attraction.

Cast-Traits.name: Arranged Marriage
Cast-Traits.description: Features two characters made to marry each other, usually by their family.

Cast-Traits.name: Artificial Intelligence
Cast-Traits.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

Cast-Traits.name: Asexual
Cast-Traits.description: Features a character who isn't sexually attracted to people of any sex or gender.

Cast-Traits.name: Bisexual
Cast-Traits.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

Cast-Traits.name: Butler
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

Cast-Traits.name: Centaur
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character with a human upper body and the lower body of a horse.

Cast-Traits.name: Chimera
Cast-Traits.description: Features a beast made by combining animals, usually with humans.

Cast-Traits.name: Chuunibyou
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character with "Middle School 2nd Year Syndrome", who either acts like a know-it-all adult or falsely believes they have special powers.

Cast-Traits.name: Clone
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is an artificial exact copy of another organism.

Cast-Traits.name: Cosplay
Cast-Traits.description: Features dressing up as a different character or profession.

Cast-Traits.name: Cowboys
Cast-Traits.description: Features Western or Western-inspired cowboys.

Cast-Traits.name: Crossdressing
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

Cast-Traits.name: Cyborg
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a human character whose physiological functions are aided or enhanced by artificial means.

Cast-Traits.name: Delinquents
Cast-Traits.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

Cast-Traits.name: Demons
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

Cast-Traits.name: Detective
Cast-Traits.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

Cast-Traits.name: Dinosaurs
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features Dinosaurs, prehistoric reptiles that went extinct millions of years ago.

Cast-Traits.name: Disability
Cast-Traits.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

Cast-Traits.name: Dissociative Identities
Cast-Traits.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

Cast-Traits.name: Dragons
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

Cast-Traits.name: Dullahan
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a Dullahan, a creature from Irish Folklore with a head that can be detached from its main body.

Cast-Traits.name: Elf
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

Cast-Traits.name: Fairy
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

Cast-Traits.name: Femboy
Cast-Traits.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

Cast-Traits.name: Ghost
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

Cast-Traits.name: Goblin
Cast-Traits.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

Cast-Traits.name: Gods
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

Cast-Traits.name: Gyaru
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

Cast-Traits.name: Hikikomori
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

Cast-Traits.name: Homeless
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character that is homeless.

Cast-Traits.name: Idol
Cast-Traits.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

Cast-Traits.name: Kemonomimi
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

Cast-Traits.name: Kuudere
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

Cast-Traits.name: Maids
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

Cast-Traits.name: Mermaid
Cast-Traits.description: A mythological creature with the body of a human and the tail of a fish.

Cast-Traits.name: Monster Boy
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

Cast-Traits.name: Monster Girl
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

Cast-Traits.name: Nekomimi
Cast-Traits.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

Cast-Traits.name: Ninja
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

Cast-Traits.name: Nudity
Cast-Traits.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

Cast-Traits.name: Nun
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a nun.

Cast-Traits.name: Office Lady
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a female office worker or OL.

Cast-Traits.name: Oiran
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a courtesan character of the Japanese Edo Period.

Cast-Traits.name: Ojou-sama
Cast-Traits.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

Cast-Traits.name: Orphan
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

Cast-Traits.name: Pirates
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features sea-faring adventurers branded as criminals by the law.

Cast-Traits.name: Robots
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features humanoid machines.

Cast-Traits.name: Samurai
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

Cast-Traits.name: Shrine Maiden
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a shrine maiden.

Cast-Traits.name: Skeleton
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.

Cast-Traits.name: Succubus
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a succubus, a creature in medieval folklore that typically uses their sexual prowess to trap and seduce people to feed off them.

Cast-Traits.name: Tanned Skin
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

Cast-Traits.name: Teacher
Cast-Traits.description: Protagonist is an educator, usually in a school setting.

Cast-Traits.name: Tomboy
Cast-Traits.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

Cast-Traits.name: Transgender
Cast-Traits.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

Cast-Traits.name: Tsundere
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

Cast-Traits.name: Twins
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

Cast-Traits.name: Vampire
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

Cast-Traits.name: Veterinarian
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a veterinarian or one of the main characters is a veterinarian.

Cast-Traits.name: Vikings
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features Scandinavian seafaring pirates and warriors.

Cast-Traits.name: Villainess
Cast-Traits.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

Cast-Traits.name: VTuber
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

Cast-Traits.name: Werewolf
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a werewolf.

Cast-Traits.name: Witch
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

Cast-Traits.name: Yandere
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

Cast-Traits.name: Zombie
Cast-Traits.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

Theme-Slice of Life.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
Theme-Slice of Life.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

Theme-Slice of Life.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
Theme-Slice of Life.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

Theme-Slice of Life.name: Family Life
Theme-Slice of Life.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

Theme-Slice of Life.name: Horticulture
Theme-Slice of Life.description: The story prominently features plant care and gardening.

Theme-Slice of Life.name: Iyashikei
Theme-Slice of Life.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

Theme-Slice of Life.name: Parenthood
Theme-Slice of Life.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

Sexual Content.name: Ahegao
Sexual Content.description: Features a character making an exaggerated orgasm face.

Sexual Content.name: Amputation
Sexual Content.description: Features amputation or amputees.

Sexual Content.name: Anal Sex
Sexual Content.description: Features sexual penetration of the anal cavity.

Sexual Content.name: Armpits
Sexual Content.description: Features the sexual depiction or stimulation of a character's armpits.

Sexual Content.name: Ashikoki
Sexual Content.description: Footjob; features stimulation of genitalia by feet.

Sexual Content.name: Asphyxiation
Sexual Content.description: Features breath play.

Sexual Content.name: Bondage
Sexual Content.description: Features BDSM, with or without the use of accessories.

Sexual Content.name: Boobjob
Sexual Content.description: Features the stimulation of male genitalia by breasts.

Sexual Content.name: Cervix Penetration
Sexual Content.description: A sexual act in which the cervix is visibly penetrated.

Sexual Content.name: Cheating
Sexual Content.description: Features a character with a partner shown being intimate with someone else consensually.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Body Swapping
Theme-Fantasy.description: Centers around individuals swapping bodies with one another.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Cultivation
Theme-Fantasy.description: Features characters using training, often martial arts-related, and other special methods to cultivate qi (a component of traditional Chinese philosophy, described as "life force") and gain strength or immortality.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Curses
Theme-Fantasy.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Exorcism
Theme-Fantasy.description: Involving religious methods of vanquishing youkai, demons, or other supernatural entities.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Fairy Tale
Theme-Fantasy.description: This work tells a fairy tale, centers around fairy tales, or is based on a classic fairy tale.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Henshin
Theme-Fantasy.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Isekai
Theme-Fantasy.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Magic
Theme-Fantasy.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Mythology
Theme-Fantasy.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Necromancy
Theme-Fantasy.description: When the dead are summoned as spirits, skeletons, or the undead, usually for the purpose of gaining information or to be used as a weapon.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Reverse Isekai
Theme-Fantasy.description: Features a character from a fantasy world who is transported into a modern day setting.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Shapeshifting
Theme-Fantasy.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Steampunk
Theme-Fantasy.description: Prominently features technology and designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Super Power
Theme-Fantasy.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Superhero
Theme-Fantasy.description: Prominently features super-powered humans who aim to serve the greater good.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Wuxia
Theme-Fantasy.description: Chinese fiction concerning the adventures of martial artists in Ancient China.

Theme-Fantasy.name: Youkai
Theme-Fantasy.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Anti-Hero
Cast-Main Cast.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Elderly Protagonist
Cast-Main Cast.description: The protagonist is either over 60 years of age, has an elderly appearance, or, in the case of non-humans, is considered elderly for their species.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Ensemble Cast
Cast-Main Cast.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Estranged Family
Cast-Main Cast.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Primarily Adult Cast
Cast-Main Cast.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Primarily Animal Cast
Cast-Main Cast.description: Main cast is mostly composed animal or animal-like characters.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Primarily Child Cast
Cast-Main Cast.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Primarily Female Cast
Cast-Main Cast.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Primarily Male Cast
Cast-Main Cast.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

Cast-Main Cast.name: Primarily Teen Cast
Cast-Main Cast.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

Theme-Action.name: Archery
Theme-Action.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

Theme-Action.name: Battle Royale
Theme-Action.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

Theme-Action.name: Espionage
Theme-Action.description: Prominently features characters infiltrating an organization in order to steal sensitive information.

Theme-Action.name: Fugitive
Theme-Action.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

Theme-Action.name: Guns
Theme-Action.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

Theme-Action.name: Martial Arts
Theme-Action.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

Theme-Action.name: Spearplay
Theme-Action.description: Prominently features the use of spears in combat.

Theme-Action.name: Swordplay
Theme-Action.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Assassins
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Criminal Organization
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Prominently features a group of people who commit crimes for illicit or violent purposes.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Cult
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Firefighters
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Centered around the life and activities of rescuers specialised in firefighting.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Mafia
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Military
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Police
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Triads
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Centered around Chinese organised crime syndicates.

Theme-Other-Organisations.name: Yakuza
Theme-Other-Organisations.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

Theme-Other-Vehicle.name: Aviation
Theme-Other-Vehicle.description: Regarding the flying or operation of aircraft.

Theme-Other-Vehicle.name: Cars
Theme-Other-Vehicle.description: Centers around the use of automotive vehicles.

Theme-Other-Vehicle.name: Motorcycles
Theme-Other-Vehicle.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

Theme-Other-Vehicle.name: Ships
Theme-Other-Vehicle.description: Prominently features the use of sea-based transportation vessels.

Theme-Other-Vehicle.name: Tanks
Theme-Other-Vehicle.description: Prominently features the use of tanks or other armoured vehicles.

Theme-Arts-Music.name: Band
Theme-Arts-Music.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

Theme-Arts-Music.name: Classical Music
Theme-Arts-Music.description: Centers on the musical style of classical, not to be applied to anime that use classical in its soundtrack.

Theme-Arts-Music.name: Dancing
Theme-Arts-Music.description: Centers around the art of dance.

Theme-Arts-Music.name: Hip-hop Music
Theme-Arts-Music.description: Centers on the musical style of hip-hop, not to be applied to anime that use hip-hop in its soundtrack.

Theme-Arts-Music.name: Jazz Music
Theme-Arts-Music.description: Centers on the musical style of jazz, not to be applied to anime that use jazz in its soundtrack.

Theme-Arts-Music.name: Metal Music
Theme-Arts-Music.description: Centers on the musical style of metal, not to be applied to anime that use metal in its soundtrack.

Theme-Arts-Music.name: Musical Theater
Theme-Arts-Music.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

Theme-Arts-Music.name: Rock Music
Theme-Arts-Music.description: Centers on the musical style of rock, not to be applied to anime that use rock in its soundtrack.

Setting-Scene.name: Bar
Setting-Scene.description: Partly or completely set in a bar.

Setting-Scene.name: Boarding School
Setting-Scene.description: Features characters attending a boarding school.

Setting-Scene.name: Camping
Setting-Scene.description: Features the recreational activity of camping, either in a tent, vehicle, or simply sleeping outdoors.

Setting-Scene.name: Circus
Setting-Scene.description: Prominently features a circus.

Setting-Scene.name: Coastal
Setting-Scene.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

Setting-Scene.name: College
Setting-Scene.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

Setting-Scene.name: Desert
Setting-Scene.description: Prominently features a desert environment.

Setting-Scene.name: Dungeon
Setting-Scene.description: Prominently features a dungeon environment.

Setting-Scene.name: Foreign
Setting-Scene.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

Setting-Scene.name: Inn
Setting-Scene.description: Partially or completely set in an Inn or Hotel.

Setting-Scene.name: Konbini
Setting-Scene.description: Predominantly features a convenience store.

Setting-Scene.name: Natural Disaster
Setting-Scene.description: It focuses on catastrophic events of natural origin, such as earthquakes, tsunamis,  volcanic eruptions, and severe storms. These works often present situations of extreme danger in which the characters struggle to survive and overcome the adversity.

Setting-Scene.name: Office
Setting-Scene.description: Features people who work in a business office.

Setting-Scene.name: Outdoor Activities
Setting-Scene.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

Setting-Scene.name: Prison
Setting-Scene.description: Partly or completely set in a prison.

Setting-Scene.name: Restaurant
Setting-Scene.description: Features a business that prepares and serves food and drinks to customers. Also encompasses cafes and bistros.

Setting-Scene.name: Rural
Setting-Scene.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

Setting-Scene.name: School
Setting-Scene.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

Setting-Scene.name: School Club
Setting-Scene.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

Setting-Scene.name: Snowscape
Setting-Scene.description: Prominently or partially set in a snowy environment.

Setting-Scene.name: Urban
Setting-Scene.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

Setting-Scene.name: Wilderness
Setting-Scene.description: Predominantly features a location with little to no human activity, such as a deserted island, a jungle, or a snowy mountain range.

Setting-Scene.name: Work
Setting-Scene.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

Theme-Game.name: Board Game
Theme-Game.description: Centers around characters playing board games.

Theme-Game.name: E-Sports
Theme-Game.description: Prominently features professional video game competitions, tournaments, players, etc.

Theme-Game.name: Video Games
Theme-Game.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

Theme-Drama.name: Bullying
Theme-Drama.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

Theme-Drama.name: Class Struggle
Theme-Drama.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

Theme-Drama.name: Coming of Age
Theme-Drama.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

Theme-Drama.name: Conspiracy
Theme-Drama.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

Theme-Drama.name: Eco-Horror
Theme-Drama.description: Utilizes a horrifying depiction of ecology to explore man and its relationship with nature.

Theme-Drama.name: Fake Relationship
Theme-Drama.description: When two characters enter a fake relationship that mutually benefits one or both involved.

Theme-Drama.name: Kingdom Management
Theme-Drama.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

Theme-Drama.name: Rehabilitation
Theme-Drama.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

Theme-Drama.name: Revenge
Theme-Drama.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

Theme-Drama.name: Suicide
Theme-Drama.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

Theme-Drama.name: Tragedy
Theme-Drama.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.name: Card Battle
Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.name: Go
Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.description: Centered around the game of Go.

Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.name: Karuta
Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.description: Centers around the game of karuta.

Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.name: Mahjong
Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.description: Centered around the game of mahjong.

Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.name: Poker
Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.description: Centers around the game of poker or its variations.

Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.name: Shogi
Theme-Game-Card & Board Game.description: Centers around the game of shogi.

Theme-Sci-Fi.name: Cyberpunk
Theme-Sci-Fi.description: Set in a future of advanced technological and scientific achievements that have resulted in social disorder.

Theme-Sci-Fi.name: Space Opera
Theme-Sci-Fi.description: Centers around space warfare, advanced technology, chivalric romance and adventure.

Theme-Sci-Fi.name: Time Loop
Theme-Sci-Fi.description: A character is stuck in a repetitive cycle that they are attempting to break out of. This is distinct from a manipulating time of their own choice.

Theme-Sci-Fi.name: Time Manipulation
Theme-Sci-Fi.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

Theme-Sci-Fi.name: Tokusatsu
Theme-Sci-Fi.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

Demographic.name: Shoujo
Demographic.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

Demographic.name: Shounen
Demographic.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

Setting.name: Matriarchy
Setting.description: Prominently features a country that is ruled by a Queen or a society that is dominated by female inheritance.

Theme-Comedy.name: Parody
Theme-Comedy.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

Theme-Comedy.name: Satire
Theme-Comedy.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

Theme-Comedy.name: Slapstick
Theme-Comedy.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

Theme-Comedy.name: Surreal Comedy
Theme-Comedy.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

Theme-Sci-Fi-Mecha.name: Real Robot
Theme-Sci-Fi-Mecha.description: Prominently features mechanical designs loosely influenced by real-world robotics.

Theme-Sci-Fi-Mecha.name: Super Robot
Theme-Sci-Fi-Mecha.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.
